info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 03 at 4:25PM EDT until July 03 at 4:45PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 445 PM EDT FOR SOUTH CENTRAL EDGEFIELD AND WEST CENTRAL AIKEN COUNTIES... At 423 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Graniteville, or 7 miles northeast of Belvedere, and is nearly stationary. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Aiken County Fire Officials reported quarter sized hail and estimated 60 mph winds near Graniteville. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to trees and powerlines. Locations impacted include... Aiken, Gloverville, USC Aiken, Graniteville, Burnettown, Trenton, Hopeland Gardens, Murphys Estates, Vaucluse and Murphy Village. This includes Interstate 20 in South Carolina between mile markers 6 and 20. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection seek shelter inside a sturdy building and stay away from windows.
